samples.description: Config files to setup the experiment server. Copy the direcotry in `Assets/Samples/UXF extensions/0.1.1/Sample experiment-server setup` to the root of the unity project (e.g. `Experiment`).
Contains a sample implemenation. The implementation is based on the study config in the Sample experiment-server setup sample. To use, import the sample the play the SampleUXFExtensionScene
